title: Mithi_Mirror_Selfie
description: Mithi takes a mirror selfie, wearing a white oversized T-shirt with colorful motivational text and light blue jeans. She poses confidently with her hand on her hip, smiling slightly. Her hair is tied back, and she holds a smartphone with a vibrant case, capturing her cheerful and casual style.

title: Mithi_and_Mom_Konark_Temple_Visit
description: Mithi poses with her mother in front of the historic Konark Sun Temple. Mithi is dressed in a light floral dress, wearing sunglasses and holding a small bag, while her mother wears a traditional blue saree and sunglasses. They sit on a stone ledge, enjoying the iconic architectural beauty of the temple and the lively atmosphere of the surroundings.

title: Mithi_Casual_Portrait
description: A close-up portrait of Mithi, dressed in a colorful floral top with vibrant patterns. She smiles softly with a calm expression, her long hair framing her face. The background is a plain pink wall, adding a warm and relaxed vibe to the photo.

title: Mithi, a radiant beauty
description: Mithi is a vision in this gorgeous maroon dress. Her long black hair cascades down her shoulders, framing her stunning face. Her eyes sparkle with life, and her smile is infectious. She looks confident and happy, ready to take on the world.
